title: Game AI
description: Examines expressive possibilities of artificial intelligence techniques in computer games.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 3600 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (LCC 2100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LCC 2700 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2700 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2000 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
